movies.title: I Think the World of You
movies.plot: 'Volim te najvise na svetu' is a contemporary romantic comedy. It is a story about a modern mother, a widow who is trying to keep her son and daughter at home and thus delay their coming of age and becoming independent. The film starts when her daughter introduces her boyfriend. Mother tries to disqualify the guest by various tricks and get him out of the house as unwanted. Unfortunately, this time she has faced an equal rival. The visit gets off as an accidental get together. When it turns out daughter has already married him, all hell breaks loose.
movies.simplePlot: 'Volim te najvise na svetu' is a contemporary romantic comedy. It is a story about a modern mother, a widow who is trying to keep her son and daughter at home and thus delay their coming of...

biography.bio: Tanja Boskovic was born on June 27, 1953 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia as Tatjana Boskovic. She is an actress, known for Balkan ekspres (1983), Srecni ljudi (1993) and Pozoriste u kuci (2007).
biography.name: Tanja Boskovic

biography.bio: Dragan Petrovic-Pele was born on December 17, 1961 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Joli village, jolie flamme (1996), The Fourth Man (2007) and Absolute Hundred (2001).
biography.name: Dragan Petrovic-Pele

biography.bio: Ana Sofrenovic was born on September 18, 1972 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Legionnaire (1998), Accroché au ciel (2000) and The Brothers Bloom (2008). She was previously married to Dragan Micanovic.
biography.name: Ana Sofrenovic

biography.bio: Ivan Tomic was born on October 29, 1972 in Kragujevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Where Have You Gone (2011), Mladici (2007) and I Think the World of You (2003).
biography.name: Ivan Tomic

biography.bio: Branislav Zeremski was born on September 19, 1959 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Frozen Stiff (2002), Strangler vs. Strangler (1984) and Dva sata kvalitetnog TV programa (1994).
biography.name: Branislav Zeremski

biography.bio: Slobodanka Latinovic was born on May 1, 1976 in Novi Sad, Serbia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress and casting director, known for Almost Ordinary Story (2003), I Think the World of You (2003) and Lost and Found (2008).
biography.name: Slobodanka Latinovic

biography.bio: Milutin 'Mima' Karadzic was born on April 9, 1955 in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Komsije (2015), Montevideo: Taste of a Dream (2010) and The Beauty of Vice (1986).
biography.name: Milutin 'Mima' Karadzic

biography.bio: Gorica Popovic was born on August 13, 1952 in Kragujevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress and writer, known for Zvezdara (2013), The Wounds (1998) and In the Jaws of Life (1984).
biography.name: Gorica Popovic

biography.bio: Ana was graduated at Faculty of dramatic arts in Belgrade. Studied acting at Faculty of dramatic arts in Belgrade under famous Serbian acting professor Vladimir Jevtovic. Ana got through "Master Class" course for acting, in Belgrade, under famous acting professor Vladimir Jevtovic and famous director Kokan Mladenovic. She studied acting with Jelena Jovicic, Jelena Ilic, Nikola Vujovic, Petar Mihailovic.
biography.name: Ana Bretsnajder

biography.bio: Petar Kralj was born on April 4, 1941 in Zagreb, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is known for his work on Bela ladja (2006), Underground (1995) and Technotise: Edit & I (2009). He was married to Sonja Divac and Ljiljana Gazdic. He died on November 10, 2011 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Petar Kralj

biography.bio: Miljana Kravic was born on November 22, 1980 in Belgrade, Serbia. She is an actress, known for Nitrat corba (2006), 6 Days Dark (2014) and Dudes (2001).
biography.name: Miljana Kravic
